title: Determine a function from its derivative graph

content.question: The graph of the derivative of f is shown in the figure above. Which of the following could be the graph of f?

choices.label: A graph plots a line that originates from the third quadrant, passes through the origin, and further rises into the first quadrant.
A graph plots a line that originates from the second quadrant, passes through the origin, and further falls into the fourth quadrant.

A graph plots a wave shaped curve that originates from the third quadrant, rises through the point negative 2 comma 0 to a maximum point in the second quadrant. The curve then falls down through the origin to a minimum point in the fourth quadrant, and further rises through the point 2 comma 0 into the first quadrant.

A graph plots a wave shaped curve that originates from the third quadrant, rises through the negative x axis to a maximum point in the second quadrant. The curve then falls down through the origin to a minimum point in the fourth quadrant, and further rises through the positive x axis into the first quadrant.

A graph plots a wave shaped curve that originates from the second quadrant, falls through the negative x axis to a minimum point in the third quadrant. The curve then rises up through the origin to a maximum point in the first quadrant, and further falls through the positive x axis into the fourth quadrant.

content.answer: A graph plots a wave shaped curve that originates from the second quadrant, falls through the negative x axis to a minimum point in the third quadrant. The curve then rises up through the origin to a maximum point in the first quadrant, and further falls through the positive x axis into the fourth quadrant.

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
